resources.string: Something went wrong : ( That\'s okay, make sure your network connection is ok and try again!
Free this weekend?\nMatch up with 3 people around you, chat in the app and make plans to go somewhere cool!
Matches disappear at the end of every weekend. You can choose to keep matches you liked in your friends list.
Go again next weekend to meet more people and grow your friends list!

We don’t use any photos, and we don’t post anything to Facebook.

We ask for your birthday and hometown to fill out your profile.

We use location services and Facebook login to make sure you get matched with real people around you.

Finally, Go is for people who want to meet people, so we ask for your friends who use the app so you don’t get matched with people you already know!

Hey there! Go matches you with cool people around you based on age and gender. That\'s why we ask everyone to set up a full profile before they use the app. If that\'s okay with you, please fill in the missing fields below before getting started!
What gender do you identify with?
One of your required fields is missing! Please set up your profile before continuing.
The birthday you entered is not working. Please enter a valid birthday!
Match me in groups by gender:
No! Go is not a place for finding dates, hookups, flings, trysts, affairs, and/or dalliances.
So then who is this app for?
Go is for people who want to meet people. Real life people, right here in Vancouver. If (i) you like meeting new people and (ii) you’re free this weekend, then Go is for you!

Matches are groups of 4 people that are free this weekend. If you’re free, press the big shiny “Go” button and Go will match you with 3 other people around you. You can then chat with each other in the app. Make plans to go somewhere cool! Matches only last for one weekend.
Why do matches only last for the weekend?

Matches disappear every week so you can make new matches and meet more awesome people. So quit dwelling on the past! Go looks forward, not backward; upward not forward; and always twirling, twirling, twirling towards next weekend!

After you meet, Go leaves it up to you to decide who to keep in touch with. When your match disappears, you’ll be prompted to choose who you want to keep as friends. Keep using Go to meet more people and grow your friends list.
4 is the magic number! 3 and 5 are graceless odd numbers, and 6 is too many. Nothing quite like a great crew of 4.
Why can’t I choose my matches?

Go isn’t about choosing who to make friends with based on what they look like. It’s also not about making you assemble and maintain a ‘profile’ that you think others will find attractive. That’s why Go profiles are minimal and have no photos. Go is a place where everyone is welcome, no one is judged, and unlikely friendships are made.
Who are you people? Why are you doing this?

When we were little we had the school yard. In college we had the dorm. Now we’re all grown up and we don’t have an excuse anymore to just hang out and make new friends. Well, that sucks. We want an easy way to meet new people in the city. People who are just like us. People who are really different. All kinds of people. People who want to meet people.
We are totally just getting started! And we’re far from perfect, so if you found a bug, you’d be doing us a huge favor by letting us know below — we’ll buy you a drink!
Thoughts? Feelings? Hunches? Cool stories? Get in touch and send us a message, we’d love to hear from you : )
Press the big shiny “Go” button and Go will match you with 3 other people around you. Chat with each other in the app and make plans to go somewhere cool!
Matches only last for one weekend, so make sure to meet up! Your matches will disappear at the end of the weekend, and you\'ll be able to choose who you want to add to your friends list.
Go again next weekend to make new matches, meet more people and grow your friends list!
More questions? Check out the FAQ in the Settings tab.
Remember: this chat will disappear on Monday, so make plans to meet this weekend. Say hello, and have fun!
After deletion, both you and this contact will be removed from each other\'s friend lists and will be unable to chat again. Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
If a user makes you feel at all uncomfortable, please report them. They will be flagged, removed from your friends list and prevented from contacting you again.
Something is rotten in the state of your network connection… No worries, just try again later!
